description: Amendments to planning permission dated 28th March 2012 (RN:11/05626/FULL) for the Variation of Condition 91 of planning permission dated 12 November 2009 (APP/X5990/A/09/2101893) for redevelopment of site to provide new buildings of two basements, lower ground, ground and nine upper floors to northern part of site (fronting Strand), and two basements, ground and part 10/part 14/part 12upper floors to southern part of site (fronting Temple Place) to provide offices (Class B1); 151 residential dwellings (Class C3); 98-bed hotel and 18 serviced suites (Class C1); and/or retail, financial and professional services, restaurant, caf√©, bar, and hot food take away uses (Class A1/A2/A3/A4/A5) at ground floor level; car parking for 107 cars; servicing area; and new access, public courtyard, landscaping, engineering and other associated works, namely amendments to vehicle access arrangements from Arundel Street, to the internal cores at ground level, to the internal servicing and car parking layout at basement levels and creation of an additional third basement level. NAMELY, alterations to typical east and west bays on Surrey Street, Arundel Street and courtyard elevations; celerestories omitted to penthouse roofs; solar panels omitted and green and brown roofs relocated and rationalised; roof level massing on court yard side emphasised; roof level minor cladding and roof line adjustments and alterations to north elevation to Arundel Street block.
